about_the_game:
This is a collection of BGM tracks from The Fruit of Grisaia.
The tracks are available in both MP3 and WAV (high-quality) format.

BGM Production:
Track 1,4,8,9,13,16,20,22,28,29 Junpei Fujita(Elements Garden)
Track 2,5,6,7,11,17,19,21,27 Hitoshi Fujima(Elements Garden)
Track 3,10,12,14,15,18,23,24,25,30 Haruki Mori(Elements Garden)
Track 26 Hajime Kikuchi(eufonius)


MP3:192kbps
WAV:44.1kHz 16bit
